results.name: Coefficients of Laguerre recursive polynomials with an (n+2)!/2 multiplication factor and alpha=a0 =-1 from Hochstadt: P(x, n) = (2*n + a0 + 1 - x)*P(x, n - 1)/(n + 1) - n*P(x, n - 2)/(n + 1);.
reference: page 8 and page 42 - 43; Harry Hochstadt, The Functions of Mathematical Physics, Dover, New York, 1986
mathematica: a0 = -1; P[x, 0] = 1; P[x, 1] = 1 + a0 - x; P[x_, n_] := P[x, n] = (2*n + a0 + 1 - x)*P[x, n - 1]/(n + 1) - n*P[x, n - 2]/(n + 1); Table[ExpandAll[(n + 2)!*P[x, n]/2], {n, 0, 10}]; a = Table[CoefficientList[(n + 2)!*P[x, n]/2, x], {n, 0, 10}]; Flatten[a]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Mar 23 2008
